heroSection.title: NAYA SUCCESS AXIS
heroSection.description: Experience quality eggs, meats and chicks nurtured with care and delivered to you.

whyChooseUs.title: Quality, innovation and food safety.
whyChooseUs.text1: NAYA Success Axis is an Agribusiness that started as a backyard poultry farm in 2018. It was registered as a fulltime business in April 2019 at the Registrar General Department. It Currently has 2 branches in Accra – Adenta and Aburi - Mariakrom in the Eastern Region.

products.text: Healthy, well-raised live poultry layers sourced from trusted farms.
Farm-fresh eggs collected daily, ensuring natural taste and quality.
Clean, high-quality broiler wings, breast, thighs, neck, full broiler etc.
Healthy smoked chicken in various prices and sizes, very clean and hygienic.

whyChooseUs.title2: We take care of your health
whyChooseUs.text2: Our poultry and eggs are sourced from healthy, well-maintained farms to ensure that every product you consume is safe, nutritious, and of the highest quality. Your health is our priority.

products.name: The Best Poultry
products.text: Fresh and healthy poultry raised on trusted farms, ensuring top quality for your meals.

products.name: Chick Quality
products.text: Healthy, strong chicks ideal for farmers and hatcheries, sourced from reliable breeders.

products.name: Pasteurized Egg
products.text: Safe and hygienically pasteurized eggs, retaining all nutrients and natural flavor.

products.name: Medium and Large Eggs
products.description: Farm-fresh brown eggs from Layers. Rich in omega-3 and vitamins. Per Crate
products.description1: Our Medium and Large Eggs are carefully collected from free-range hens that roam freely on lush pastures. Packed with protein, omega-3, vitamins, and minerals. Perfect for baking, cooking, or boiled eggs. Raised without hormones or antibiotics.

products.name: Layers
products.description: Healthy Layers. Excellent egg layers. 1 goes for GHS90 and 3 goes for GHS200
products.description1: These Healthy day-old Layers are raised to ensure strong and productive starters for your flock. Vaccinated and hormone-free, perfect for beginners and experienced poultry keepers. Each chick is hand-checked to ensure quality and vitality.

products.name: Broiler Breast
products.description: Boneless, skinless organic broiler breast. Raised without antibiotics.
products.description1: Our Broiler Breast comes from chickens raised on certified organic farms, free from antibiotics and hormones. Perfect for grilling, baking, sautéing, or stir-frying. Tender, juicy, and flavorful.

products.name: Broiler Wings
products.description: Fresh organic broiler wings, perfect for grilling and frying.
products.description1: Our Broiler Wings are tender and juicy, raised on organic farms without hormones or antibiotics. Ideal for grilling, frying, or roasting. Packed with protein and natural flavor.

products.name: Broiler Thighs & Drumstick
products.description: Tender broiler thighs and drumsticks, ready for cooking.
products.description1: Our Broiler Thighs & Drumsticks come from healthy chickens, vaccinated and locally raised. Perfect for stews, grilling, or roasting. Juicy, flavorful, and nutritious.

products.name: Broiler Neck, Feet and Back
products.description: Whole chicken parts including neck, feet, and back.
products.description1: Our Broiler Neck, Feet, and Back are from organic, free-range chickens. Perfect for soups, stews, or traditional dishes. Fresh, flavorful, and ethically raised.

products.name: Full Broiler
products.description: Whole organic broiler chicken, ideal for roasting.
products.description1: Our Full Broiler is raised on certified organic farms, free from antibiotics and hormones. Perfect for roasting, baking, or slow-cooking. Fresh, tender, and ethically sourced.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The quality of chicks we received was exceptional. 98% survival rate and they're thriving. Best poultry supplier we've worked with in 15 years of farming.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Their commitment to animal welfare and organic practices aligns perfectly with our values. The eggs are consistently fresh and customers love them.

testimonials.name: Felix Oteng
testimonials.content: I really like your website interface it is really nice, catchy and easily navigated. Your products are all quality, I really loved the chicken meat.

ourteamSection.text: Our team works really hard to keep this wonderful company going to produce and meet consumers' needs.

story.title: This Is Our Story
paragraphs: NAYA Success Axis is an Agribusiness that started as a backyard poultry farm in 2018. It was registered as a fulltime business in April 2019 at the Registrar General Department. It Currently has 2 branches in Accra – Adenta and Aburi - Mariakrom in the Eastern Region. NAYA Success Axis aims to be one of the poultry giants in Ghana and the subregion.

The core business is Poultry farming & processing to increase the shelf-life of chicken and add variety to locally produced chicken. The business employs Four(4) fulltime staff and Four(4) other part-time and casual staff. We have over Thirty(30) others working indirectly along our value chain operations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide convenient, ready-to-consume, locally raised (and spiced) Chicken with longer shelf-life and Eggs to consumers.
points: Ensure animal welfare in all operations

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: “Leader in locally produced poultry products, changing mindsets, and making positive impact in communities”

values_section.title: Products
values_section.description: The business currently has the following products on the shelf;
values_section.problem: Local poultry processors in Ghana lack the infrastructure and equipment to produce chicken cuts and other processed options and varieties preferred by most consumers.
values_section.solution: Crunchy Chicken Chips made with locally reared chicken, spiced, dried, and thinly sliced to last for not less than one month. Our solution adds value to chicken to increase shelf-life and reduce post-harvest losses.

leftContent.heading: Produced in Ghana by
leftContent.description: We are dedicated to providing fresh, organic, and hygienically processed poultry products. Proudly produced in Ghana with high standards to serve homes, restaurants, and marketplaces.
